Posts.Content: Mar 26, 2008 04:46PM lagilk1 wrote: Hi I'm Laurie from Ohio and today was my 8th tx. After reading through this conversation I wish I had gotten back to this site earlier. It feels so good to see my concerns addressed and know that I'm not going through this alone. guggerty, my onc said if I miss one or two over the course not to worry (I drive over an hour after working to get to the center), but I know how you feel about wanting to get this over and done so life can maybe settle back down.  Maybe you need to give them a really bright sticky note with your cell phone on it for your file or tell them to switch the cell and home phone in the records. I thank you all for sharing. L
Posts.Title: March 2008 Rads Team brst26 juliajo
